title: In most anticipated series at Fenway in years, Red Sox faceplant against Yankees in opener
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: The Red Sox lost 4-1 to the Yankees in a crucial series opener at Fenway Park.
Boston's offense struggled, managing just two hits and going 0-for-8 with runners in scoring position.
The Red Sox committed three errors, contributing to their defeat despite Lucas Giolito's solid pitching.

title: Former Patriots DE Deatrich Wise Jr. suffers season-ending injury
author: Kaley Brown
bullets: Deatrich Wise Jr. suffered a season-ending left quad injury during a game against the Green Bay Packers.
Wise, a Washington Commanders defensive end, was injured while attempting to block an extra point in the second quarter.
The former Patriot and NFL veteran signed a one-year, $3.25 million contract with the Commanders in March.

title: When will Connelly Early pitch next for Red Sox? Alex Cora explains
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Connelly Early is a candidate to start for the Red Sox against the Athletics at Fenway Park on Tuesday.
Early impressed in his MLB debut, tying a Red Sox record with 11 strikeouts over five scoreless innings.
Red Sox manager Alex Cora is also considering young pitchers Payton Tolle and Kyle Harrison for upcoming starts.

title: Scott Boras says he, Alex Bregman are ‘waiting until the offseason’ before making opt-out decision
author: Kaley Brown
bullets: Alex Bregman and agent Scott Boras will decide his Red Sox future after the 2025 season ends.
Bregman signed a three-year, $120 million deal with Boston, including opt-outs for 2025 and 2026.
Bregman has hit .279 with 16 home runs in 2025, contributing significantly to the Red Sox's young roster.

title: 5 must-watch movies & TV shows streaming right now
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: 'Misery' (1990), a horror-thriller based on Stephen King’s work, is streaming on HBO Max.
'Warfare' (2025), co-directed by Ray Mendoza, depicts a real-time 2006 Iraq mission, streaming on HBO Max.
'Only Murders in the Building' Season 5, featuring Steve Martin and Selena Gomez, streams on Hulu.

title: Patriots injury report: Christian Gonzalez, Keion White ruled out vs. Dolphins
author: Kaley Brown
bullets: Cornerback Christian Gonzalez will miss his second straight game due to a hamstring injury sustained in July.
Defensive end Keion White is ruled out of Sunday's game against the Dolphins due to an illness.
Linebacker Marte Mapu and tackle Morgan Moses are questionable for the Patriots' game in Miami.

title: With DC Terrell Williams out, who will be calling defensive plays for Patriots vs. Dolphins?
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Inside linebackers coach Zak Kuhr will call defensive plays for the Patriots against the Dolphins in Terrell Williams's absence.
Terrell Williams is away from the team due to an undisclosed health matter but expected to return next week.
Kuhr, previously an offensive coordinator, began his coaching career with Mike Vrabel at Ohio State in 2011.

title: Boston activist Monica Cannon-Grant to plead guilty in federal fraud case
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Monica Cannon-Grant plans to plead guilty in a federal fraud case involving defrauding donors to her nonprofit, Violence in Boston.
The indictment accuses Cannon-Grant and her late husband of wire fraud, mail fraud, and other charges tied to misused nonprofit funds.
Cannon-Grant's trial was set for October 14, but a plea hearing will now be arranged with no set date yet.

title: Here’s what we know about Tyler Robinson, Charlie Kirk’s alleged assassin
author: The Associated Press
bullets: Tyler James Robinson, 22, was arrested for allegedly shooting Charlie Kirk at Utah Valley University, facing multiple felony charges.
Robinson, a Dixie Technical College student, lived with his Republican parents in Washington, Utah, and had no prior criminal record.
Robinson's politically motivated views surfaced recently; Discord messages show he discussed obtaining a gun to target Kirk.

title: 7 things to know about a pivotal Red Sox-Yankees series
author: Conor Roche
bullets: The Red Sox and Yankees start a crucial series at Fenway Park, vying for the top American League wild-card spot.
Boston leads the season series against New York 8-2, highlighting strong performances by pitchers Brayan Bello and Garrett Crochet.
Trevor Story has been key for the Red Sox offense recently, while the Yankees rely heavily on home runs for success.
